GSD.product_version: versions from v5.13 to before v5.16.11
GSD.description:
cfg80211: fix race in netlink owner interface destruction

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.16.11 by commit c979f792a2baf6d0f3419587668a1a6eba46a3d2, it was introduced in version v5.13 by commit ea6b2098dd02789f68770fd3d5a373732207be2f. For more details please see the references link.
